content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my backdoor looking east into the sky where i saw one bright star like object and a smaller dimmer one next to it which caught my attention and looked odd because of their proximity to each other, another small dim one  was to the right of those 2. the 2 on the left did not have any movement but the third one to the right started to descend disappearing behind a tree top, the bright and dim one to the left of the one that was descending suddenly disappeared like they were shut off. my wife had just been at the doorway with me when this happened, i called to her and told her what i had just seen. two commercial jets flew over a couple of minutes later one just a little ahead of the other heading east, these were easy to see with their flashing red lights nothing like the lights that disappeared.
content.summary: Bright and dim star like lights third dim star like first 2 vanished 1 descended

content.detailedDescription: I heard a rumbling that sounded like a helicopter while inside my kitchen.  i went out on the back porch to see if it was a helicopter and how close?  when standing on the back porch i realized the noise was from a military jet.  i decided to watch for a little while. i saw 3 or 4 airplanes in different parts of the sky looking to the east.  all of the sudden i saw one huge light come on and then another then the third and they were spread across in a line at a 45 degree angle.  they were a fire color and after the 3 lit up there was a blue light that came one for the last 2 or 3 seconds then they all went out.  each light must have been half a mile apart.  i think they were 10 miles away or more.  i think these 4 lights were on the same craft.  all around i saw some smaller star like lights that looked like stars that appeared about 4 seconds after and vanished in a sequence. there were 6 or 7 of the small ones that i saw.
content.summary: Huge fire like lights in a line.

content.detailedDescription: I'm always taking sky pictures and not always but every now and then i find things that shouldn't be there.   yesterday was one of those times. i take random pictures without really focusing because i like surprises and because i like aiming at the sun and surrounding clouds and it's hard to really focus at those.  i got home, connected my phone to the computer and went through my pictures. this is when i saw them.  i circled them.
content.summary: Found 2 ufo's in pictures i took

content.detailedDescription: Maynot have been flasing; itloiked like from where i stood on my porch; "to be abt , or aroun 500 to less than 100 feet above me, suddenly, off to my left i saw a missle like object come over a mountain ("semi toward my direction, thinking at first it was maybe aan airplane on fire, then realizing  it was actually heading straight for the object with lights, that was houvering off to my right side, & in the blink of an eye, the missle hit the object , exploding, then just as suddenly "imploding!!") & then within the blink of my eye the previously houvering object,  just shot off in a northerly trajectery over the mountain, whereas the mssle that hit the missle came from the westerly trajectery.  the missle must have destroyed itself when it hit the other object, or maybe was just absorbed by it, beccause the hovouring object seemed as if it gad not secured any vsible damage, and was able to quickly just extrwmely rapidly fly off in a level direction, & never did i se either object ascen or desscend, both flew very level! when i first observed the missle i became very frightened, because i realzed it was cmng somewhat in my direction over the  mountains neatest to me abt a mile away frm my home!  that morning, "i phoned the "barkng sands military & nasa installation on my island, (kauai,") & ask the switchboard operator there abt it, & strangely they did not deny shooting a missle, but refused to tell me what it was they shot at, & that that was orders from d.C, (so was classified , mplied!) but denyed they shot at something coming "over the mountain and that i must be mistaken as to where or what the missle flew over! thats it and it all took place at twilight in early mornng!
content.summary: I observed a houvering object, (with different colored light, may, or

content.detailedDescription:
I saw an unidentified object in december 1974 while driving in modesto, ca. at about 10:30 pm.  the night sky was relatively clear with a few scattered clouds; there was no fog that night.  i was east-bound on higbee drive at gayland drive when i noticed a white object in the sky to my north and stopped my vehicle the study it when i realized that it could not be the moon. 

the object appeared to be a self-illuminated sphere that was a consistent shade of bright-white across the object.  initially, it was stationary and motionless; i observed no detectible movement by the object.  at the time i estimated that if it was a helium-filled balloon it would have been at a distance of 100 yards from me, about 3 feet in diameter and about 100 feet above the ground.  after observing the object stationary for about 3 minutes it started moving due west at a slow rate of speed, perhaps 3 to 5 mph.  i made a u-turn and followed/paralleled the object.  during this movement the object never seemed to vary its speed or altitude and i did not see any change in the illumination.  it moved about 600 feet and stopped again.  about 60 seconds after stopping, the object began to drip molten metal.  i assess that it was molten metal because i could see sparks fly off the dripping material as it fell.  i have never seen burning plastic or any burning/molten material other than metal throw sparks in the same way.  it continued to drip molten metal slowly, but steadily for about 30 seconds before stopping.  after a few more seconds the lighted sphere began to dim as if someone was turning a rheostat/dimmer very slowly and evenly.  it took about one minute for the object to go completely dark, to the point where i could no longer make out the outline of the object against the dark night sky.  during this time it took the object to completely dim it did not appear to change altitude or move.  it appeared to be completely stationary.  

the total time of this event was about 7 or 8 minutes, perhaps a little longer.  i had my windows down during this event and heard no sounds that were unusual or out of the ordinary.  at one point during its transition the object crossed the path of at least one above-ground electric power line.
content.summary: Saw a self-illuminated sphere

content.detailedDescription: Sister in law took the pictures
content.summary: These pictures were taken by my sister in law while at work

content.detailedDescription: Driving north bound on the highway spotted two ufo's with a red-orange glow, they were traveling at 100 mph. i pulled out my cell phone to take a picture and cell phone would not function.
content.summary: Ufo was seen in the stockton area over highway 99 going south there were 5 total and one of them changed direction. they had a red-orange glow.

content.detailedDescription: I smoke outside of my home on the lake. i have observed on a weekly basis what appears to be "chinese lanterns". this happens all year round in summer,spring,winter,and fall. i've shown other people this anomaly, they've agreed it isn't"normal" in appearance. the lights are orange, they flicker, not blinking like airplane lights do and seem to change direction abruptly. the lights come in a group of 3-4 as well as a single one, depending on the night. it's after the sun has set, so around 6-10 pm..I've questioned myself a lot with this as it happens so often. i'm not sure if this can be explained away or not. i'm really just looking for answers as to what this could be.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I live on the lake and see what initially appears as "chinese lanterns" on a weekly basis. i have shown others this and hey agree it's abnormal and conclude that they are not in fact "chinese lanterns".

content.detailedDescription:
We live on the ohio river on the kentucky side and i woke up and saw 6 hovering balls of bright white light. there were two smaller ones stacked on top of one larger one then to the right was another stack of three smaller ones. they just floated there. definitely were not stars because stars do not reflect off the river, only the moon does, but these did reflect. they were all stationary for about 5 minutes then the top two on the left stack suddenly accelerated rapidly to the north. the top two on the right stack accelerated rapidly to the east. the bottom one on the right went north. that left the largest one which hovered in place then slowly traversed east before accelerating quickly east. 
our house has multiple large windows which gives a fantastic view of the river and indiana. there was no mistaking those lights were above the old navy ordnance site. it's now part of river ridge, of course.
content.summary: 6 ufos hover over old navy ordnance site near utica

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 4:58am to let dog out noticed a bright white light that i passed off as a plane landing as i returned to let dog in i noticed it was in the general same direction so i got a 9×40 rifle scope to see better as i noticed insane movements and stops as i shined a laser at it (not cool i know) it stopped hovered and remaind from 5:15 and is still there as i write at 5:45 wish you had a number to call so a professional could witness the event
content.summary: White light in center black triangle at 140° southeast

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 4:58am to let dog out noticed a bright white light that i passed off as a plane landing as i returned to let dog in i noticed it was in the general same direction so i got a 9×40 rifle scope to see better as i noticed insane movements and stops as i shined a laser at it (not cool i know) it stopped hovered and remaind from 5:15 and is still there as i write at 5:45 wish you had a number to call so a professional could witness the event
content.summary: White light in center black triangle at 140° southeast

content.detailedDescription:
In 1992 my family lived in a two story farm house in the hills of central pennsylvania. our nearest neighbor was a good mile away. the nearest towns were muncy and montoursville. the closest city was williamsport which was about 45 min away. 

i was 10 years old. my bedroom was on the 2nd story. when i layed in bed i could see directly out one of the windows in my room onto the green hill that sloped down and then up to cow pasture and high hill. i could also see a solitary pear tree in our front yard about 10-20 yards from the house. 

one evening i was woken up by a vibrating sound. i opened my eyes and i saw a huge black craft hovering above the pear tree. it was so big that i could only view part of it through the frame of the the window. it was sleek, black, and it had colored flashing lights on it. 

i sat up in bed and stared. i was frozen. i'm getting goosebumps as i write this so many years later. i knew immediately that it was a ufo. i had read about ufo's in books at the library. 

then there is a period of time i don't quite remember. 

then i remember being downstairs. my mother was asleep on the recliner. i woke her up screaming "mom there's a ufo- look!" and i ran to the window and opened the blinds. there was nothing there. 

my mother told me to go to bed, i must have had a bad dream. i tried to tell my parents again the next day but they didn't listen. 

for years i told this same story over and over again at parties or to random people but i could never tell it with confidence because i had no proof. 

then one day 15 years later i was at a friend's house hanging out. i went to the restroom and sitting on the toilet was a magazine that read "williamsport wave." the year read "1992." i was shocked. on the cover were drawings of the craft i saw. it was the mufon journal. i came out of the bathroom screaming "you are never going to belive this!!!" 

my friend had picked up the journal randomly at half priced books. he didn't know anything about it- he just thought it looked cool and it was $1. in that journal i read other accounts that matched with mine. the sightings even trace a flight path directly through the middle of nowhere that my family lived. 

i finally had proof! now i can tell the same old story with complete conviction. the only part i'm curious about is the time between seeing the object and being downstairs with my mother. anyways, thank you mufon for all that you do.
content.summary: Mufon williamsport wave 1992. i saw the craft hovering outside my windown at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription: Saw over 10 ufo's across the sky horizontally patterned. mostly all were the same size, but one was really bigger than the others. they were not stars, if they were then they would be all around the sky, but they weren't. earlier that day, i saw a another ufo that was moving in the sky, which was extremely weird like. there is no words to describe the movement of that craft, it wasn't anything i have ever seen before. all i can say that it was traveling through the sky backwards, with two glowing dots in the sky.
content.summary: Over 10 ufo's in the size.

content.detailedDescription: Just adding video from previous report...Dogs woke me up barking...Waited until they calmed down to walk them ...Leashed one dog to tree and other dog went nuts and ran to the back of six acre property barking and i looked up and there was a pulsating light changing colors and now that i look at video it seems as though the shape is also shifting ...You notice it more when you pause the video. got in my car to turn on high beams so i could see where my dog ran to but had to move the car a slight bit in order to see where my dog went to and the car would not start i tried to crank a few times it finally started i slightly moved the car then car died and started rolling backwards and i almost ran over my other dog.It felt weird and freaked me out....The car would not start...So i ran to rear of property got my dog that was bouncing all over the place took them inside cause that thing was still in the sky...Next day car was running fine and my uncle who is a master mechanic came over and i told him what happened and he tested my battery and it was drained of the power. i had to buy a new battery. i just wanted to update my story with this video.
content.summary: Just adding video fro previous report

content.detailedDescription: I'll make this quick because it happened quick. took dog for pee 9 at night in driveway. saw orange red streaking light like a shooting star but it was low. maybe as high as a small plane would fly not 35000 mor like a couple thou. it moved real fast to the west over lake havasu and out of sight within a few seconds. i was like what the f. kind of a freaky feeling of uncertainty. it was to low to be a shooting star and not white. to fast to be a plane or jet. it was like a rocket but had no sound. never seen anything like it and had to share. wish someone else saw it???
content.summary: Orange light moving fast. like a shooting star but low like a small plane altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a recent sighting. after watching a ufo program on sky discovery one of the people said they saw a cigar shape craft. this made me think of what i saw many years ago here in new zealand. you may or may not need this info, tho i thought i would put here for you any way.
  i was working on my parents dairy farm. it was spring time here,the year was between 1978 to 1980, tho i can not remember the exact year now. i can not remember the exact month tho would of been between late september to mid november and i had just finished feeding the calves and was walking to the house on the drive way. it was just on 7pm. it was a very clear and dark night full of stars. i always looked up at night to see if any thing in the night as ufo's had been seen years before, if you want to know about this one get in touch and i will tell you tho i was even younger then.
 as i was about to turn towards the house i looked up and right above my head and going over our house was this big cigar shape craft. i thought it may of been a space craft, human made, tho i was not sure as back then i thought all ufo's were of disk shape.
 this craft was moving slowly and silently in the night moving north or north east. what stood out was the four lights in the shape of triangles, one each end of the cigar shape and one each in the middle, top and bottom.
 the bottom triangle light was wide base and pointing at the top, the normal way you would draw a triangle, the one above it was like up side down with the wide base at the top and the point pointing down to the bottom. the two on the end were also pointing inwards with the point and wide base on the outside ends of the craft, if you can understand what i mean.
 as for the colour of the lights i can not remember sorry or if they were flashing or not, i feel they were flashing tho not sure sorry. some things are clear as in my thoughts while some finer details like the light colours are not.
 i know this is a very long time ago and you may not want this, i just thought you may want to put on your records.
 years earlier there was another sighting of a white light late at night moving slowly a long the mountain here then slowly going over the top and out of sight. my mother talked to a lady the next day who lived at the end of the mountain who also watched it, her dogs were barking crazy. she went outside and heard no noise, just the white light moving slowly.
  my mother rang the airport in rotorua the next day to see if there was any helicopters out the night before and was told there was none out, tho she said they rang back an said there was. this we did not believe as there was no noise at all and dogs do not normally bark at a helicopter.....
 i do remember my mother telling me of another sighting of a bright yellow /orange light over the lake tho she did not say much more than that, all these sightings were very long ago, i do not live in that area now, tho not far as the mountain, mt tarawera, is still in sight from a different view at times.
 i have always thought there is more out there than just us humans, i do hope they are friendly, not like us humans who will kill all that lives on this planet with animals and humans a like,
content.summary: Cigar shape craft with four triangle lights silently moving above me

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on i-469 on the east side of fort wayne. looked to my left  and slightly ahead of me and saw large reddish ball unlike any other color or size i've seen before. kept looking at it to see if it was moving and it appeared to be stationary and so i thought it must be a radio or cell tower light, though it seemed higher in the sky than that could be. tried to look below it and then saw a very faint red light going down,spiraling towards the ground, and i wondered if i was then seeing the reflection from a tower structure. that didn't seem possible at that distance at about 8:35 pm at night. suddenly the light started moving down and north and i really had to crane my neck to see what was happening. it seemed to get just above treetop height and then flashed and disappeared, like it was moving away from me. 

i felt taken aback and heart started beating faster when i realized that it was not anything i could explain and was clearly not a red tower light.
i looked to the southeast and saw 3-4 radio towers in the distance and they were very different from what i had just seen. could imagine no other explanation for its color, shape, movement and disappearance. 

it looked to be a couple of miles away and initially maybe a quarter to a half mile above the ground, but as it was very dark, it was hard to see the horizon very well.
content.summary: Large fuzzy reddish/pink globe just east of i-469 by fort wayne in

content.detailedDescription: I have observed small orb like lights around the house since last spring. i looked out my window to the east where i had observed them most. i saw a bright orange light then another through the trees west of the house. they grew bright and i went outside to get a better look. they were in a cresent shape. then it slowly dimmed then the lights faded to dark. this happened at 2200
content.summary: Orange lights past the trees about a mile away moving, then held still and dimmed to dark

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were in the hot tub. sky was very clear. then cloud cover came in from the north, just a few low mushroom shaped clouds came into view. my husband said the clouds looked odd, 30 seconds later i was looking up toward the west where the clouds rolled in and saw a blue light that suddenly appeared in the sky. it was not very large, but just above the tree line and the light was only there for a few seconds but long enough for me to observe that it was traveling very fast. it made no sound. it was traveling south and perhaps a little to the west. it was orb like pulse of blue light that was traveling to low and fast to be a plane. but it was visible for only a moment and my husband did not see it.
content.summary: Traveling fast and low emitted pulse of blue light for a second or two then was gone

content.detailedDescription: Found out picture
content.summary: Found on recent picture

content.detailedDescription: I was 17, we were 4x4 ing in the woods of north carolina, havelock outside cherry point marine corp base! we got stuck in the mud both trucks! all we had was a four wheeler to go back the 35 minute drive to town to get another guy out there to pull us out! they told me to stay behind make sure no one would mess with the trucks. i had two beers in me and i weighed 170 pounds! they left me with my friends ar15! it was so dark and scary i decided to go behind a row of trees that opened into a field a pasture! i cracked open my third beer when a light appeared out of nowhere!  at first i thought it was a harior jump jet because of the militarries proximity!  i got scared raised the gun and shot three times at it! then they blocked my memory and i never realized it until 2013! you must understand that the military never showed up so what ever i shot at was only revealed to me in 2013! they told me that this laser being shot into my left eye was encoding my brain through my optic nerve and that they were the alien resistance a group different from the greys! they told me that everything i needed to know to change the course of the history of the world would be encoded in me! in 2010 after fighting brain damage for 18 years it was like a light switch went off in my head i was flooded with complex physics and cosmology concepts! they told me that these theories and my art would change the course of mankind! if you don't believe me brianmalpasso youtube i was always smart but this knowledge the visions i see, the conceptual frame work for all of creation, even the understanding of all meanings of particle physics, reality and astrology! i'm not saying i'm right they are and this is the messages i received! no one believes me because they can't understand the theories! professor after professor have ignored me with no words from mit, princeton or harvard for 4 years i've been explaining this knowledge given to me! they said if you don't start listening then the next phase is coming and all of you won't like it much! they say the bases for my life was to be used as a messenger, change your ways!!
content.summary: They shot a laser into my left eye and told me they were the alien resistance

content.detailedDescription: Me and girlfriend pull up at home i look in sky all time see things everynight just dont have a camera and it alway around 630 pm to 4am everywhere i see them all time use a flash light sometimes blink at them and sometimes they blink back or beam a light or move above closer see me i was happy see them ask for knowledge or teach me or come to me they just watch i do same try get them talk to me and they disappear sun come up
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: War,chases,lazers,plasma,rainbow colors,fast as light or stay above float take off gone 1 sec

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside smoking when he said: "why is that star moving?" - "what star?" he pointed up to the sky and when i saw it, it was just as high as any of the stars appeared to be. "that's not a plane" he said. me: "no.. no that's not a plane and it's moving too fast to be a satellite." then it abruptly turned east and zoomed across the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white and star like moving north east, then abruptly turned east.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i feel like an idiot even reporting this. it is not the first time i have seen something but the first time in many years.

i was parked by lake erie; there is a park behind the willowick police station. i just happened to pull in and thought i would sit there and look at the lake and relax.

it was something like 5:30(ish) in the afternoon, it had been a pretty clear day and turning into a clear evening.

before seeing the object i felt a little... i really don't know how to put it, off..  like lets say you are looking through a camera and you zoom out, maybe so things are like 20-30 feet further from you.. now imagine this effect all the way around you (really strange and i don't know how else to explain it). with this came the feeling that you would get if you were around a bunch of high energy transformers that would make your hair stand on end, but without the hair standing.. just the sort of feeling of energy, again sounds really strange and even more stupid typing it.

then i noticed off to the left maybe 30 degrees from my looking forward the object. it was not huge but not small. i had lots of feelings at that moment. primarily how in the heck did i not see this until now? did it just appear? did it fly in? was it there the entire time/ i don't have an answer to that.

now for more strange stuff. at first it appeared as if the object was sort of oval shaped. it had a glowing blueish light around the entire bottom edge. now i don't know if it turned and that exposed the true shape (more like a triangle-ish shape but with curved no pointy corners or if it changed shape. 

let's just say it turned because that is what appeared to have happened; then it began moving across the sky more towards dead in front of me, but away at the same time. it was moving at a good pace but nothing record breaking. as it moved away however it became more and more faint (as in transparent) until it just was not there.

while this was happening and i would say the whole thing lasted less than 5 minutes i felt like it was just me and this craft and nothing else existed. this feeling i am sure was because i was so taken by what i saw that i did not realize my surroundings.

i want to say the craft made a humming sound but i am not sure that it did. it almost felt like the hum was inside me???? like if you are in an airplane that low level hum that just resonates through your body, if you know what i mean?? like that but very quiet and i was not in this thing.

now as i said this all took place over what i would think to be about 5 minutes, i was sitting in my car maybe 5 minutes before it started and a couple minutes after it was gone. i live about 15 minutes from this location, and i drove straight home.  another odd fact i got home at 8:15.

i have not ever been to a site like this and while i believe life forms exist in many places outside of our own planet it is not something i really give any thought to. i mean we are here so i am sure there are life forms elsewhere thinking; i wonder if there is anything out there.

i don't know what to make of this and i am equally sure it is nothing. so the question is what in the heck was it?
content.summary: Appeared to be round at first then triangle with rounded edges - not coming to a point - bluish kind glow end side along edge

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in the car with my adult daughter. she happened to look up and noticed three bluish-white lights in the sky. they were oval or football-shaped. the lights sometimes formed a triangular shape.They moved around abruptly, and sometimes followed each other, zig-zagging at times. they moved quickly, but smoothly, and did not move like planes or helicopters. they made no noise and stayed behind the clouds. they remained for at least five minutes and were still there when we left the area. no idea what they were. a family friend also saw them that same night in the same town (not sure of the area).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 blue lights moving over brownsville texas

content.detailedDescription: In early evening at dusk my mother and i were in the yard of our farm when we noticed a very long oblong aerial craft moving slowing toward terrain rising on the hill adjacent to the farm. it was completely silent, oblong cigar shaped, with five large lighted windows along the side.  i did not see any occupants.  it appeared to be headed for a collision with part of the hill.  it did not collide, but disappeared behind the hill.  on the other side of the hill is a numbered route following a river.  i have never heard of anyone else who saw the craft; my mother swore me to secrecy because at that time people were ridiculed for seeing/reporting/believing such things as alien craft.  however, i know what i saw - and she is no longer able to stop me from speaking out.  i did think, at first, that it was a craft which had lost its engines, thence the silence, but now realize that was not the case.
content.summary: Two observers silent vehicle with five huge lighted oblong windows along the side. silent and slow moving..

content.detailedDescription: It was 7:00pm and i was telling a friend about seeing a ufo last night and how strange it was. we went outside and i told him it was just like a star at first and when i pointed to where it was seen the night before, there it was again ! exactly as last night. we watched it for about 20 minutes and we saw it dodge a plane that just left from love field airport. the pilot must have seen it !  i saw a bright red light fly from the horizon and flew towards and around the original object fairly quick and then the red light flew away from us at a high speed towards ft. worth. we watched the original object till 9:00pm till it disappeared far on the horizon. it was high up and moving slowly, maybe 5 to mph
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed same light as last night.  very high starlike object moving erratically watched it for 2 hrs slowly flying east to northwest and dodged airplane.

content.detailedDescription: It was december 14th of 2015 at 4:41 am. i thought i was dreaming my nephew was in the bathroom, so as i waited on the edge of my bed for him to finish i must have grabbed my phone i took a picture of the dog, then something made me go towards the window and start recording immediately afterwards. next day i'm looking thru pictures to show my friend a picture of my granddaughter when i came across this video. not i,not my family could believe this video that was taken from my phone. want to have it analyzed for authenticity as well as having me being put under to find out what really took place. i felt to have something genuine. i knew this is it. my dad said he believed and we thought he was kidding. only thing that scared me is not  remembering taking the picture or video. i need answers
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I took a picture of my dog on foot of bed the went to window and videoed 26 sec of some ufo. here's the crazy part don't remember actually doing it. it seemed dream like

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at perfetti where they make the airheads and heard a loud whoosh sound. my hubby thought it sounded strange but i chalked it up to an airplane. then, on the way home, we saw this thing in the sky. at first we thought it was a plane. then we noticed it definitely was not a plane. it looked like a huge upside down drone with the legs sticking up in the sky. on the bottom was a dome shaped piece and it looked chrome and glowing. it just kinda hovered there for as long as we could see it, as the driver of the car didnt stop. we thought it was strange. it looked strange, it was way bigger than any other flying object i had ever seen and it amazed me how low it was to the ground.
content.summary: Driving down the highway and thought we saw a plane. then realized it looked like a giant upside down drone. no idea what it was.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from night shift work along with co workers jose garcia who i was car pooling with, jose wa driving his suv and i was sat in the front passenger seat of his vehicle. as we were traveling south down highway 33 we neared the north end of the town of taft, i noticed three bright orange lights in the sky. i first thought the lights were mounted on oil rig equipment but noticed as we traveled south on the highway the lights were moving in the same direction. i pointed the lights out to jose and he drove his vehicle to the albertsons supermarket parking lot in the town of taft were i had left my vehicle, we pulled into the parking lot i got out of the vehicle and started to film the lights as the passed behind the stripmoll which i was standing in front of, unfortunately the flood lights on the building obscured the lights of the ufo so my phone didn't capture what we were viewing. as we were watching this event unfold i noticed a police officer also watching the lights, he then entered his suv and i shouted over to him did he see the lights, the officer drove his vehicle out of the parking lot and made a gesture to me i believe acknowledging he had seen the same lights. as i was doing this jose was still watching the lights as the disappear into the low cloud cover. all the time this event unfolded there was no aircraft sounds, engine or vehicle sounds other than jose vehicle and the police vehicle. the ufo made no sound and glided by us very slowly.
content.summary: Traveling south on highway 33 entering town of taft, observed three orange lights in sky traveling south east.
